title: Israel Army Chief Puts Troops On Alerts For "Possible Entry" Into Lebanon
content: Israel's army chief told troops on Wednesday to be prepared for a "possible entry" into Lebanon as Israeli fighter jets bombarded Hezbollah targets across the border.
summary: Israel's army chief told troops on Wednesday to be prepared for a "possible entry" into Lebanon as Israeli fighter jets bombarded Hezbollah targets across the border.

title: In A 1st, China Operates All 3 Aircraft Carriers At Once, Near Japan, Taiwan
content: The Chinese People's Liberation Army Navy (PLAN) reportedly operated its three aircraft carriers for exercises or tests over the past week for the first time.
summary: The Chinese People's Liberation Army Navy (PLAN) reportedly operated its three aircraft carriers for exercises or tests over the past week for the first time.

title: Putin's 'Top Secret' Meet Over Nukes As Ukraine Plans Cruise Missile Attack
content: Vladimir Putin called for an urgent meeting of Moscow's top security council to discuss its nuclear deterrence. The move comes amid concerns in Russia over Ukraine being allowed by Western powers to use cruise missiles to target locations in Russia.
summary: Vladimir Putin called for an urgent meeting of Moscow's top security council to discuss its nuclear deterrence. The move comes amid concerns in Russia over Ukraine being allowed by Western powers to use cruise missiles to target locations in Russia.

title: "In Some Areas, No City, Village Spared": Lebanese Witness On Israel Strikes
content: No city or village in certain areas has been spared in the Israeli strikes on Lebanon in which over 500 civilians, including 50 children have been killed, a resident of Beirut has told NDTV, claiming that citizens are standing with Hezbollah.
summary: No city or village in certain areas has been spared in the Israeli strikes on Lebanon in which over 500 civilians, including 50 children have been killed, a resident of Beirut has told NDTV, claiming that citizens are standing with Hezbollah.

title: China Firm Fires Employee For Refusing To Buy Breakfast For Boss
content: Lou recounted how her supervisor demanded she bring her a hot Americano and an egg every morning, as well as keep a bottle of water readily available.
summary: Lou recounted how her supervisor demanded she bring her a hot Americano and an egg every morning, as well as keep a bottle of water readily available.

title: S Korean Vlogger Claims To Have Aborted Baby At 9 Months, Probe Underway
content: A South Korean vlogger has courted controversy after claiming that she terminated her pregnancy at nine months.
summary: A South Korean vlogger has courted controversy after claiming that she terminated her pregnancy at nine months.

title: 4 Indian-Origin Men Charged For Abusing Cop In Singapore
content: A nearly two-minute video of the four abusing the police officer at a crime scene was uploaded on Facebook.

title: Musk Reacts After Vinod Khosla Demands Apology For Spreading False Claims
content: Prominent Indian-American businessman Vinod Khosla and billionaire Elon Musk had a public war of words over a land battle in California and an allegedly altered image of a sign on a beach.
summary: Prominent Indian-American businessman Vinod Khosla and billionaire Elon Musk had a public war of words over a land battle in California and an allegedly altered image of a sign on a beach.

title: The Tragic Tale Of 2 West Bank Teenagers Freed In Gaza Truce
content: Newly freed from an Israeli prison, Wael Masha rode atop friends' shoulders through the streets of his West Bank refugee camp before bursting into his home to kiss his mother's feet.
summary: Newly freed from an Israeli prison, Wael Masha rode atop friends' shoulders through the streets of his West Bank refugee camp before bursting into his home to kiss his mother's feet.

title: MIT Students Disrupt Israeli Professor's Talk, Steal Pizza in Bizarre Protest
content: The professor expressed frustration, stating that "facts don't matter to them" and that the students were reciting pre-determined statements rather than engaging with his actual account.

title: US Rapper Sean 'Diddy' Mercilessly Raped Woman After Drugging Her: Lawsuit
content: Music mogul Sean Combs, also known as Diddy, and his former bodyguard drugged and violently raped a woman in 2001 and filmed the act to show it to his friends, according to a new lawsuit against him.
summary: Music mogul Sean Combs, also known as Diddy, and his former bodyguard drugged and violently raped a woman in 2001 and filmed the act to show it to his friends, according to a new lawsuit against him.

title: Opinion: The Real Reason US Keeps Accusing Russia Of Meddling In Its Elections
content: The truth is that the ongoing allegations and counter-allegations of election interference are just one front in a larger information war between the West and Russia.
summary: The truth is that the ongoing allegations and counter-allegations of election interference are just one front in a larger information war between the West and Russia.

title: Singapore's Population Surges - Crosses 6 Million-Mark For 1st Time Ever
content: Singapore's population has reached a record high of 6.04 million, rising two per cent from last year, as the manpower-constrained city-state took in more foreign workers, according to an official report.
summary: Singapore's population has reached a record high of 6.04 million, rising two per cent from last year, as the manpower-constrained city-state took in more foreign workers, according to an official report.

title: "Even A Squirrel...": Meryl Streep On Women's Rights In Afghanistan
content: American actor Meryl Streep has said a "squirrel has more rights" than a girl in Afghanistan, adding her voice to a call by Afghan women to end the Taliban government's severe restrictions on their lives.
summary: American actor Meryl Streep has said a "squirrel has more rights" than a girl in Afghanistan, adding her voice to a call by Afghan women to end the Taliban government's severe restrictions on their lives.

title: Why Sri Lanka's President Has Called For A Snap General Election - 5 Facts
content: Sri Lanka will hold a parliamentary election on November 14, the government announced on Tuesday, less than two months after the island nation elected Anura Kumara Dissanayake as its new President.
summary: Sri Lanka will hold a parliamentary election on November 14, the government announced on Tuesday, less than two months after the island nation elected Anura Kumara Dissanayake as its new President.

title: "Quite a Stir": Strange Fish With Alien Features Found On US Beach

title: What Is the Axis of Resistance? Can It Challenge Israel's Military Power?

title: Saudi Man Jailed For 30 years For Criticising Government On Social Media
content: A Saudi court sentenced a retired teacher to 30 years' jail for criticising the government on social media, less than two months after his death sentence was overturned, his brother said on Tuesday.
summary: A Saudi court sentenced a retired teacher to 30 years' jail for criticising the government on social media, less than two months after his death sentence was overturned, his brother said on Tuesday.

title: How Hezbollah Is Attacking Israel Despite Death Of Its Top Commanders
content: Israel's assault on Iran-backed Hezbollah over the past week, including the targeting of senior commanders and the detonation of booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies, has left it reeling.
summary: Israel's assault on Iran-backed Hezbollah over the past week, including the targeting of senior commanders and the detonation of booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies, has left it reeling.

title: Joe Biden Tells Hillary Clinton 'I Love You' After Being 'Trapped' By Wife
content: US President Joe Biden professed his admiration for former First Lady Hillary Clinton and stated that he loved her for defending him in public after he was "trapped" by his wife, Jill Biden, to give a speech in New York City.
summary: US President Joe Biden professed his admiration for former First Lady Hillary Clinton and stated that he loved her for defending him in public after he was "trapped" by his wife, Jill Biden, to give a speech in New York City.
